subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: In the teams’ first game in the new American Athletic Conference, Rutgers survived two rallies by Southern Methodist from 21-point deficits to earn a triple-overtime victory.
snippet: In the teams’ first game in the new American Athletic Conference, Rutgers survived two rallies by Southern Methodist from 21-point deficits to earn a triple-overtime victory.
